results.title: Simvastatin-Ezetimibe enhances growth factor expression and attenuates neuron loss in the hippocampus in a model of intracerebral hemorrhage
results.text_hl: In the present study, we evaluated whether @CHEMICAL_Simvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@simvastatin-ezetimibe@@@ combined therapy improved neurological outcomes and endothelial @<m>DISEASE_Inflammation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ responses in an experimental @DISEASE_Cerebral_Hemorrhage @DISEASE_MESH:D002543 @@@ICH@@@ model.

citations.NLM: Wang KW, Liang CL, Yeh LR, Liu KY, Chen CC, Chen JS, Chen HJ, Wang HK. Simvastatin-Ezetimibe enhances growth factor expression and attenuates neuron loss in the hippocampus in a model of intracerebral hemorrhage Fundam Clin Pharmacol. 2021 Aug;35(4):634-644. PMID: 33278834

results.title: Comparison of the effect of simvastatin versus simvastatin/ezetimibe versus rosuvastatin on markers of inflammation and oxidative stress in subjects with hypercholesterolemia.

results.title: Quantitative and qualitative pleiotropic differences between Simvastatin single and Vytorin combination therapy in hypercholesterolemic subjects.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe_Simvastatin_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069499 @@@Vytorin@@@ mostly altered the expression levels of genes related to @<m>DISEASE_Inflammation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@/oxidative stress; it downregulated the @GENE_NFKB1 @GENE_4790 @@@NF-KappaB@@@ and upregulated the expression of anti-@<m>DISEASE_Inflammation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ cytokine, @GENE_IL10 @GENE_3586 @@@IL-10@@@, and anti-oxidant enzymes, @GENE_GPX1 @GENE_2876 @@@GPX1@@@ and @GENE_SOD2 @GENE_6648 @@@SOD2@@@, but also upregulated the expression levels of genes involved in cellular activation, adhesion, and coagulation cascade, including @GENE_VWF @GENE_7450 @@@VWF@@@, F7, @GENE_PF4 @GENE_5196 @@@PF4@@@, @GENE_PF4V1 @GENE_5197 @@@PF4V1@@@ @GENE_SELP @GENE_6403 @@@SELP@@@, @GENE_ITGB3 @GENE_3690 @@@ITGB3@@@, @GENE_ITGB5 @GENE_3693 @@@ITGB5@@@.

citations.NLM: Sternberg Z, Chichelli T, Sternberg D, Hojnacki D, Drake A, Liu S, Hu Q, Munschauer F. Quantitative and qualitative pleiotropic differences between Simvastatin single and Vytorin combination therapy in hypercholesterolemic subjects. Atherosclerosis. 2013 Dec;231(2):411-20. PMID: 24267260
